content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

It's great that you're taking a proactive approach to your mental health and seeking guidance from Sarah, your therapist. Involving her in your decision-making process will help ensure that you're using these resources effectively and safely.

Remember, it's essential to be open and honest with Sarah about your experiences, concerns, and goals. Don't hesitate to ask questions or share your thoughts and feelings with her. She's there to support and guide you throughout your journey.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you all the best in your therapy sessions and your journey towards better mental health.

Take care of yourself!
